reviews.review_msg: He genuinely cares about his students learning something useful for their lives and he also wants all of them to do well. Lecture can be long but he tries to make it interesting. Definitely should take this course with him if you're thinking about it  by the way, if you're reading this Michel, thanks being an awesome prof! :)

Very funny good humored prof. Lecture format is more open to dialogue with class, and drawing on his experience as he is a M.D. If you are interested in the politics of medicine and want a perspective you don't get from the typical doctor, then take this class.  refreshing change. Keeners, are the only one complaining about lack of structure,
